results.title: Simvastatin-dependent apoptosis in Hodgkin's lymphoma cells and growth impairment of human Hodgkin's tumors in vivo.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@-dependent apoptosis in @<m>DISEASE_Hodgkin_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006689 @@@Hodgkin's lymphoma@@@ cells and growth impairment of @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ @<m>DISEASE_Hodgkin_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006689 @@@Hodgkin's tumors@@@ in vivo.

citations.NLM: von Tresckow B, von Strandmann EP, Sasse S, Tawadros S, Engert A, Hansen HP. Simvastatin-dependent apoptosis in Hodgkin's lymphoma cells and growth impairment of human Hodgkin's tumors in vivo. Haematologica. 2007 May;92(5):682-5. PMID: 17488694

results.title: Treatment of hypercholesterolemia and combined hyperlipidemia with simvastatin and gemfibrozil in patients with NIDDM. A multicenter comparison study.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ produced 15-30% reductions in @CHEMICAL_Triglycerides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014280 @@@triglyceride@@@ levels in @<m>DISEASE_Hodgkin_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006689 @@@CHL@@@ but no change in @DISEASE_143890 @DISEASE_OMIM:143890 @@@IHC@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Tikkanen MJ, Laakso M, Ilmonen M, Helve E, Kaarsalo E, Kilkki E, Saltevo J. Treatment of hypercholesterolemia and combined hyperlipidemia with simvastatin and gemfibrozil in patients with NIDDM. A multicenter comparison study. Diabetes Care. 1998 Apr;21(4):477-81. PMID: 9571327
citations.BibTeX: @article{9571327, title={Treatment of hypercholesterolemia and combined hyperlipidemia with simvastatin and gemfibrozil in patients with NIDDM. A multicenter comparison study.}, author={Tikkanen MJ and Laakso M and Ilmonen M and Helve E and Kaarsalo E and Kilkki E and Saltevo J}, journal={Diabetes Care}, volume={21}, number={4}, pages={477-81}}
